channel.title: nagano on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nagano on Barefoot Rob

item.title: made pottery
item.description: 11:04 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST We just made some pottery with an chill old man sensei. I made a mobius strip for Fred, an upside-down plate for me, a dice shaker and two dice for my students.

item.title: Nagano View Hotel
item.description: 15:27 Friday 18 August 2017 JST I am not sure of the hotel name (yet?) but there is some kinda glass bead making thing downstairs starting at 4pm so I am tooootally going to be down there for that. Hopefully there will not be a long line. (There are only 4 desks so I kinda guess I will have to wait.) They offer free hard apple cider from 3pm to 5pm.

item.title: Headed to Nagano
item.description: 07:54 Friday 18 August 2017 JST We are leaving at 10:30, after my virtual I-group meeting.
